        Parameters:

                   int component,
                   int data)
            throws BNO055.BNO055Exception
        Write a component value to the BNO055
        Parameters:

        component - Component to write
        data - Value to write
        Throws:
        BNO055.BNO055Exception

      • writeVector

        private void writeVector(edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.I2C bno055,
                         int[] vector)
                  throws BNO055.BNO055Exception
        Write a vector of values to the BNO055

        Number of bytes written defined by register. Number of elements in vector must match.

        Parameters:
        bno055 - I2C object connected to the BNO055 chip
        vector - Values to write
        Throws:
        BNO055.BNO055Exception
